column1: Just wondered if anybody knew of cash is still being accepted in Trogir or do business prefer card? Trying to work out wether worth changing my money before etc?Thanks:)
Cash is definitely accepted everywhere. However due to current situation with COVID-19, some supermarkets prefer contactless cards. Either way, you're safe.
Some restaurants didn't take cards - so check out menus before you sit down. However, I suspect that Covid-19 may have changed that.
